name: Are you lost, baby intern?
description:
Greetings to all freshly baked comp-sci graduates!

Do you want an internship that actually means something? Are you tired of mundane tasks such as filling out excel columns and bringing coffee to your boss?

Well then look no further and join us straight away for the internship of life. We offer a great environment for work, generous pays and exciting adventures! At this company you'll feel as safe as at home.

Click here to join the program now!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move around.

Mouse to look around and left mouse button to turn the flashlight on and off.

Escape to pause the game or skip cut-scenes.
